20160801.descr: Inadequate ACL checks in com_content provide potential read access to data which should be access restricted to users with edit_own level.
20160801.title: Core - ACL Violation

20160802.descr: Inadequate escaping leads to XSS vulnerability in mail component.
20160802.title: Core - XSS Vulnerability

20160803.descr: Add additional CSRF hardening in com_joomlaupdate.
20160803.title: Core - CSRF

20161001.descr: Inadequate checks allows for users to register on a site when registration has been disabled.
20161001.title: Core - Account Creation

20161002.descr: Incorrect use of unfiltered data allows for users to register on a site with elevated privileges.
20161002.title: Core - Elevated Privileges

20161003.descr: Incorrect use of unfiltered data allows for existing user accounts to be modified; to include resetting their username, password, and user group assignments.
20161003.title: Core - Account Modifications
